consentModal.title: Privacy and Performance Control
consentModal.description: We use technical cookies essential for site security (Cloudflare Turnstile) and anonymous analytics (GA4) to measure business objectives. Transparency is the foundation of our collaboration.

sections.title: Strictly Necessary (Security)
sections.description: Mandatory for system integrity. They include protection against automated attacks (Cloudflare) and storage of your privacy preferences. They cannot be disabled.

sections.title: Analytics and Improvement (Performance)
sections.description: They allow us to measure which sections generate interest and optimize the user experience. Data is processed in an aggregated and anonymous manner. Not used for external advertising purposes.
